search.query: `network` tag::conn | fields src dest src_ip dest_ip src_port dest_port flow_id uri_path http_user_agent app http_method transport | eval allips = coalesce(src_ip,dest_ip)
| search src=$src$ OR dest=$src$ dest_port!=80 AND dest_port!=8080 AND dest_port!=443 | eval tp=transport + "/" + dest_port | top tp limit=10

| search src=$src$ OR dest=$src$ | search NOT (dest=192.168.* OR dest=10.* OR dest=8.8.4.4 OR dest=8.8.8.8 OR dest=224.*) | stats sum(bytes_in) as total_bytes_in sum(bytes_out) as total_bytes_out by src dest | table src dest total_bytes_in total_bytes_out | sort â€“ total_bytes_out

| search src_ip=$src$ OR dest_ip=$src$ NOT 192.168.0.255 | eval pr=(transport + "/" + dest_port) | eval tbytes=(bytes_in + bytes_out) | stats values(pr) as Service sum(tbytes) as Bytes by src_ip dest_ip flow_id | sort - Bytes | head 10 | lookup dnslookup clientip as dest_ip OUTPUT clienthost | eval resp_hostname = coalesce(clienthost,"Unknown") | iplocation dest_ip | fields - lat lon City Region | fields src_ip dest_ip app flow_id Country resp_hostname Bytes | rename src_ip AS Source dest_ip AS Destination flow_id AS UID resp_hostname AS "Destination Hostname"
| search src=$src$ OR dest=$src$ | stats count by dest src http_method uri_path | sort 10 - count
| search (src=$src$ OR dest=$src$) dest_port=80 OR dest_port=8080 OR dest_port=443 | top dest_port
| search src=$src$ OR dest=$src$ | stats count by http_user_agent | sort 10 count
